entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is fighting in a battle.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who seems to be working with Malfoy and forcing his way through the fight.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student who seems to be working with Snape and forcing his way through the fight.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A werewolf who is fighting in the battle and attacks Harry.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: Harry's magical tool that he uses to defend himself.

relationships.description: Greyback attacks Harry with physical force.
Harry chases Snape after hearing him shout and seeing him disappear.
Harry chases Malfoy after seeing him with Snape.
Greyback attacks Harry with physical force.
Harry defeats Greyback with a spell.
